item.title: Effort to censure Rep. Ilhan Omar over Charlie Kirk comments fails
item.description: The effort was part of a GOP campaign to punish individuals Republicans accuse of posthumously smearing Kirk.

item.title: Trump says he is working to get Afghan air base from Taliban
item.description: Such an outcome would signify a remarkable rapprochement after the U.S. fought a 20-year war against the militant group.

item.title: Turning Point USA appoints Charlie Kirk’s widow as his successor
item.description: A statement from board members noted that Kirk “expressed to multiple executives that this is what he wanted in the event of his death.”
